name: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire&#039s greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he&#039s always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he&#039s just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he&#039s not going to live in anyone&#039s shadow!---Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his li
